scenes.text: The internet is breaking today! From Bollywood history to billionaire records, here are the top 5 viral stories.
scenes.search_key: breaking news digital world map background 4k

scenes.title: Ranveer's Dhurandhar Record
scenes.text: At number 5, Bollywood has a new king! Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' has officially sold 4 crore tickets, beating all-time records.
scenes.search_key: Ranveer Singh Dhurandhar movie official release poster

scenes.title: Mrunal & Siddhant Blushing
scenes.text: Number 4. Mrunal Thakur was left blushing after Siddhant Chaturvedi teased her about a 'Chennai connection' at their latest event.
We are seconds away from today's biggest viral story. Subscribe now and tune with us for more such news!

scenes.title: The Nuclear Treaty Expires
scenes.text: The Number 1 viral story: The US-Russia New START treaty has officially expired today. Global security is now in a new era. Tune with us for more such news.
scenes.search_key: US and Russia flags nuclear missile silhouette
